pathways_score()

Basic pathway networks scores of PFP class This function can extract the details in pathway fingerprint scores.

plot_PFP()

Plot PFP results Function for visualization PFP results.

plot_PFPlist()

Plot multiple PFPs.

random_score()

Extract the randomized similarity score of PFP This function extract the randomized similarity score for statistical test.

rank_PFP()

rank of the PFP object by the value of PFP_score. Function for show the rank of PFP results.

refnet_info()

Basic network information of PFP class This function extract the detail information of reference pathway networks.

refnet_names()

Names of basic networks This function extract the reference pathway network names of PFP.
